description:
minder is the client CLI for interacting with Minder by Stacklok.


## Changelog
* 5f4407f7af57ccb72ed91b16507ab722b6e1c5ee: Add Minder resource parsing using protojson and use it for data sources (#4981) (@JAORMX)
